meanings.definition: Divided or split into many parts or segments.
meanings.sent1: The multifid leaf had numerous sections along its edges.
meanings.sent2: The tree's multifid branches spread out in all directions.
meanings.sent3: The multifid puzzle was challenging to put back together.
meanings.sent4: Her multifid thoughts were scattered like leaves in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The multifid star-shaped flower was a beautiful sight in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The multifid river flowed through the valley, splitting into smaller streams.
meanings.sent2: The multifid tree provided ample shade with its many branches.
meanings.sent3: The multifid family tree had branches reaching far and wide.
meanings.sent4: Her multifid interests led her to explore various hobbies.
meanings.sent5: The multifid road network connected the towns in the region seamlessly.
